bibl.title: The Further Academic Papers of Sir Hugh Lloyd-Jones.
bibl.note: Supplément à: Greek Comedy, Hellenistic Literature, Greek Religion, and Miscellanea. The Academic Papers of Sir Hugh Lloyd-Jones (Oxford, 1990); - Greek Epic, Lyric, and Tragedy. The Academic Papers of Sir Hugh Lloyd-Jones (Oxford, 1990). - Reproduction de 44 articles et comptes rendus (1981-2003). - Sir Hugh Lloyd-Jones: Bibliography, pp. 433-446. - Indexes, pp. 447-455.
LLOYD-JONES Hugh, The Further Academic Papers of Sir Hugh Lloyd-Jones.
Oxford, University Press, 2005, 8°, viii-455 pp. ISBN 0-19-927932-2. £65.
